text: The Lincoln Navigator is a large, luxury SUV. It is manufactured by Ford Motor Company and was released in 1998. The Navigator has a niche with celebrities and the customized SUV scene. The Lincoln Navigator can seat up to 8 passengers. ==Other websites== *Lincoln Navigator on Lincoln.com == References == Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles Navigator
title: Lincoln Navigator
